type: Legendary Creature – Human Cleric Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Engage![/i] – {R}{G}{W} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Warp Ragnarok[/i] – Whenever Celica engages or another creature enters the battlefield under your control and wasn't cast, that creature deals damage equal to its power to target opponent.
